mapper.insert: insert into device_history_state(province, city, area, address, address_id, device_name, device_factory, device_model, device_id, point_type, point_value, update_time, unit, status) value (#{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{address}, #{addressId}, #{deviceName}, #{deviceFactory}, #{deviceModel}, #{deviceId}, #{pointType}, #{pointValue}, #{updateTime}, #{unit}, #{status})
